title: The Noonification: Neuralink: Elon Pledges to Get a Brain Implant (12/14/2022)
content:encoded:
How are you, hacker? ğŸªWhat's happening in tech this week: The Noonification by HackerNoon has got you covered with fresh content from our top 5 stories of the day, every day at noon your local time! Set email preference here. ## Debug Like a Senior Dev: Debugging Program Control Flow By @shai.almog [ 7 Min read ] Control flow is much more than step over. You can jump to arbitrary code offsets while debugging to reproduce elaborate states and behaviors! Read More.

Neuralink: Elon Pledges to Get a Brain Implant

By @valentineenedah [ 2 Min read ] Breaking news: Elon pledges to get a brain implant. Read More.

Introducing EU4UA: A Platform That Helps Ukrainians to Find Housing and Jobs in Europe

By @arthur.tkachenko [ 2 Min read ] EU4UA allows Ukrainian refugees to connect with European citizens willing to provide free emergency accommodation and find a job in no more than a click. Read More. ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» What happened in your world this week?It's been said that writing can help consolidate technical knowledge, establish credibility, and contribute to emerging community standards.  ## Debug Like a Senior Dev: Debugging Program Control Flow 
 By @shai.almog [ 7 Min read ] 
 Control flow is much more than step over. You can jump to arbitrary code offsets while debugging to reproduce elaborate states and behaviors! Read More.

 Breaking news: Elon pledges to get a brain implant. Read More.
Introducing EU4UA: A Platform That Helps Ukrainians to Find Housing and Jobs in Europe 
By @arthur.tkachenko [ 2 Min read ] 
 EU4UA allows Ukrainian refugees to connect with European citizens willing to provide free emergency accommodation and find a job in no more than a click. Read More.
